title: Who's Choice Is it?
itunes:title: Who's Choice Is it?
description:
Thursday 5/25- Today on the show Angela discussed how she had a good discussion about abortion from her book club the other day, so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought if abortion is a woman’s choice or a couples choice. Also, Charlamgane gave Donkey of the Day to two teachers who were fighting in class and Angela gave some relationship advice to some listeners. Also, former host of the show "106 and Park" AJ Calloway came to visit to talk about his new charity.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 5/25- Today on the show Angela discussed how she had a good discussion about abortion from her book club the other day, so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought if abortion is a woman’s choice or a couples choice. Also, Charlamgane gave Donkey of the Day to two teachers who were fighting in class and Angela gave some relationship advice to some listeners. Also, former host of the show "106 and Park" AJ Calloway came to visit to talk about his new charity.
